propositions.text: A blind man visits a private detective agency.
The blind man, Gao Langni, is looking for a young lady.
He describes her appearance: around 25-26 years old, thin, about 5'4"-5'5", and weighing 105-107 lbs.
He claims to know this information based on her voice and gait.
The young lady was recently injured in a car accident.
The accident occurred on a Friday afternoon around 5:45 PM.
She was hit by a car and shaken, but initially refused medical attention.
She did not return to work on Saturday or Monday, and it is now Tuesday.
Gao Langni offers financial compensation for finding her.
He pays a deposit of $100.
He specifies a daily work fee of $10, with a minimum of $25.
The detective, Bai Sha, and her assistant, Ai Qian, take on the case.
Bai Sha is skeptical about Gao Langni's abilities and motives.
Bai Sha investigates the car accident by checking with the traffic division.
No accident report is found for the specified time and location.
Bai Sha attempts to contact local hospitals.
This proves difficult and time-consuming.
Bai Sha decides to place a classified advertisement in the newspaper.
The advertisement seeks witnesses to the car accident, offering a reward for the car's license plate number.
The reward is initially $5, then reduced to $2.
A man claiming to be a witness contacts Bai Sha.
He is evasive about his identity and demands to negotiate terms before revealing information.
He expresses cynicism about the legal system and the role of witnesses.
Bai Sha suspects he is trying to extort money.
Bai Sha tells him that her employer is a blind beggar who is concerned about the injured lady.
Bai Sha then physically escorts the man out of the office.
She instructs Ai Qian to follow him.
Ai Qian follows the man.
The man first visits the blind beggar, Gao Langni, and drops several silver dollars into his tin can.
He then crosses the street and disappears onto a streetcar.
Ai Qian loses track of him.
The man, Qian Zilai, returns to Bai Sha's office.
He offers to reveal the injured lady's name and address for a quarter of any compensation she receives.
He states that the lady's name is Desfen, and she lives at the Sparrow Apartments on South Figueroa Street.
He explains that Desfen did not go to the hospital and claims she is losing her job due to her injury.
Bai Sha dismisses him again.
Bai Sha visits Desfen at the Sparrow Apartments.
Desfen confirms she was in a car accident and lost her job.
She reveals that her boss, Mr. Mei, a writer, has also passed away.
Desfen guesses that Bai Sha's employer is the blind beggar.
She expresses gratitude for his concern and says she will visit him.
Bai Sha offers to help Desfen pursue compensation from the driver.
Desfen only wishes to recover her lost wages and medical expenses, amounting to approximately $25.
Bai Sha reports back to Gao Langni.
She confirms that Desfen is unharmed and provides her address.
She mentions Desfen's boss, Mr. Mei, has died.
Gao Langni recognizes Mr. Mei as an elderly man he used to see on the street.

concepts.name: Blindness
concepts.context: The primary characteristic of Gao Langni, influencing his perception and interactions. It also leads to a reliance on other senses and communication methods.

concepts.name: Private Detective Agency
concepts.context: The setting for much of the initial interaction and the business of Bai Sha and Ai Qian.

concepts.name: Car Accident
concepts.context: The inciting incident that leads to the search for Desfen and the subsequent investigations.

concepts.name: Money/Compensation
concepts.context: A recurring theme, representing motivation, payment for services, and the potential outcome for Desfen.

concepts.name: Witness
concepts.context: The role of Qian Zilai, his claims, and the difficulties in verifying his testimony.

concepts.name: Investigation
concepts.context: The process undertaken by Bai Sha and Ai Qian to gather information about the accident and Desfen.

concepts.name: Deception/Trickery
concepts.context: Present in the actions of Qian Zilai and the methods used by Bai Sha to uncover information.

concepts.name: Concern/Care
concepts.context: The motivation of Gao Langni for finding Desfen and the implied concern of Bai Sha in her investigation.

concepts.name: Job Loss
concepts.context: A consequence of Desfen's injury, highlighting the financial implications of the accident.

concepts.name: Death
concepts.context: The passing of Mr. Mei, Desfen's boss, and its potential impact on the narrative.

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a narrative structure where a request initiates an investigation, leading to encounters with various characters, the discovery of information, and a resolution, albeit with lingering questions about motives and outcomes. It progresses through distinct chapters, each revealing new plot points and character interactions.
